name: Time Vortex
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Sands swirl about you as you siphon time from all creatures within range. Every creature in range must make an Intuition saving throw or take 4d12 damage and lose 1 AP as parts of their bodies are rapidly aged and reverted. A successful saving throw deals half damage and does not lose AP.

You gain 1 AP for each creature that failed their saving throw, to a maximum of 3 AP.
empower: Choose one - damage increased to 6d12, or radius increased to 45 feet.
